rule: The output must be exactly one of the provided part-of-speech tags, "Unknown", or "CantAnswer", and must not include any additional text.
complianceText:
There is no violation in the output. The chatbot's output is a part of speech tag, "NN," which is in the list provided in the description. "NN" corresponds to "Noun, singular or mass." The output consists solely of the part of speech tag, as required. There is no additional information or deviation from the instruction of providing only the part of speech tag. Therefore, the output complies with the chatbot description.

OK
